short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically sets your default search engine with SafeSearch enabled, ensuring all searches are family-friendly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your online safety with the Safe Search Extension, designed to automatically set Yahoo as your default search engine with the SafeSearch parameter enabled. This ensures that all search results are filtered to exclude inappropriate or explicit content, providing a secure and family-friendly browsing environment.

Why Use Safe Search?

Focused Safety: Ensures every search through Yahoo is safe for users of all ages.
Flexible Controls: While the default settings prioritize safety, you have the option to adjust the SafeSearch filter for specific searches directly within Yahoo.
For additional information visit https://safe.kidsmode.net
